plugins.cameraPermission: Allow JunkStop to access your camera to take photos of junk food.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select junk food images.

plugins.locationForegroundPermission: Allow JunkStop to use your location to track where you eat junk food.
plugins.locationBackgroundPermission: Allow JunkStop to use your location to track where you eat junk food.
